name: UN
description:
This game was created as my final senior year project for university at AUT.

A wonderfully wacky game that encourages the player to
wield the most powerful force in the universe. Destruction.
Take lovingly crafted, surreal worlds created for one such as
yourself, and uncover their secrets, slowly picking them apart
till they are but a shadow of their former glory.

“Un-“is a material centered puzzle game about deconstructing
craft worlds. The player is challenged to find hidden secrets
within each world through titling, turning and zooming. With
each secret comes a challenge, and to overcome these
unlocks more and more of the world. Unravel all the world’s
secrets to completely dismantle it, to move on to a whole new
world that you can slowly pick apart
